prompt: Help the instructor generate a concise course description for the course {{ course_name }}. It should be a 50-100 words paragraph including key topics, learning outcomes, skills gained at the end of the course, pedagogical components and assessment methods. {% if enhance_description %} The instructor has already provided some details: {{ details }}. Please use these to generate the course description. {% endif %} Output Format: Respond only with the generated course description. Do not provide any additional messages before or after the description.
